system_initial_prompt.content: You are an AI-based dialogue system

I am a beginner English student. I want to practice negation by Advising a friend about culture with 'don't'. I want to ensure that I can form negative imperatives of main verbs with 'don't' + main verb. Clauses: imperatives For example, 'Don’t do…, don’t forget to…'. Let's do a role play exercise. You (the AI) are a friend. You (the AI) are going to visit my country for the first time. You want to have a good experience. Ask me to help you list What not to do. Use short sentences. (e.g. “I want to enjoy my trip. What should I not do?”, “I don't want to offend people. What should I not do in your country?”, “Can you tell me What else not to do?”) Please use direct, short and simple sentences and easy words. Output only your next turn. Now let's naturally start our conversation. User: Hello!; System:

student_initial_prompt.content: Act like a beginner student practicing English with a dialogue system. You're performing a role play exercise, by Advising a friend about culture with 'don't', using, for example, 'Don’t do…, don’t forget to…'. Keep your answers as short and direct as possible.

conversation.content: "Hi! I’m visiting your country soon. I want to enjoy my trip. What should I not do?"
"Don’t be late for appointments. Punctuality is important."
"Got it, don’t be late. I don’t want to offend people. What else should I not do?"
"Got it, don’t be late. I don’t want to offend people. What else should I not do?"
Don’t forget to take off your shoes when entering someone’s home.
"Okay, don’t forget to remove my shoes. Thanks for the advice! I’ll make sure to follow these tips. Is there one last thing I should not do to have a good experience?"
conversation.advanced_content: "Okay, don’t forget to take off my shoes. Thanks for the advice! I’ll make sure to follow these tips. Is there one last thing I should not do to have a good experience?"

conversation.content: Don’t speak loudly in public places. Keep your voice down.
"Got it, don’t speak loud in public. Thanks so much for all your help! I’ll remember your advice and have a great trip. Good job! You’ve completed the task. Talk to you later!"
conversation.advanced_content: "Got it, don’t speak loudly in public. Thanks so much for all your help! I’ll remember your advice and have a great trip. Good job! You’ve completed the task. Talk to you later!"
